pages.text: Sulfuric Acid is an extremely corrosive fluid. It can only be stored in a $(l:tfc:artisanal/drums)Drum$(), not a Barrel.
Sulfuric Acid is made by blowing the fumes from hot $(thing)Sulfur$() into a water bottle with a $(thing)Tuyere$().
Like other acids, Sulfuric Acid can be used to pickle metal sheets.
